Text:
Great uploads. I appreciate that you provide them with English and Spanish audio/subtitles and you include the extras. Great work! Thanks

Any idea when you will have Django Unchained Unrated in English/Spanish:
@fishy84 Thank you for downloading and seeding them. I'll have Django Unchained by the 16th of this month or later. I don't think it's coming out unrated though.

Thanks for answering back and you are right, I must have confused that movie for something else unrated.

I look forward to the upload : )
